id.description: A unique ID for the achievement.

name.description: The user-facing name of the achievement.

lockedDescription.description: The user-facing description of the requirements to unlock the achievement. Displayed when the player hasn't unlocked the achievement.

unlockedDescription.description: The user-facing description of the requirements that unlocked the achievement. Displayed when the player hasn't unlocked the achievement.

unlockedAt.description: The seconds since epoch when the achievement was unlocked. Ignored if the achievement isn't unlocked.

maxValue.description: For achievements where `value` is a number, the value needed to consider the achievement granted.
